alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 28 at 1:37PM MST until July 28 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE SAWTOOTH AND SUPERSTITION BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 137 PM MST, local law enforcement reported multiple water rescues ongoing near Apache Junction due to significant flash flooding. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Sawtooth and Superstition Burn Scar. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
